mapper.select: SELECT USER_NO ,USER_PASSWORD ,USER_ID ,CLASS_NO ,USER_EMAIL ,USER_NAME ,USER_PHONE ,USER_AGE ,TO_CHAR(USER_REG_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS USER_REG_DT ,USER_DEL_YN FROM USER_INFO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_INFO ( USER_NO, USER_PASSWORD, USER_ID, CLASS_NO, USER_EMAIL, USER_NAME, USER_PHONE, USER_AGE ) VALUES ( USER_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{userPassword}, #{userId}, #{classNo}, #{userEmail}, #{userName}, #{userPhone}, #{userAge} )
